title: New Member/Hospital Logo
content:
First off, I wanted to say that I'm a new member, but I've been reading the forums for a while; I've just been too scared to post until now. In fact, I met many of you at TypeCon in Boston (I was a volunteer); you guys are like celebrities to me.

With that said, what inspired me to post was this logo for Milton Hospital. I just think that it's a brilliant design and deserved to be shared.

-Scott

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106090322im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Milton-Hospital-logo_5148.gif)
author: sch2525

comments.content: Nice example of Gestalt at work.

Thanks, Tiffany. And just so you know, you're the one that inspired me to finally join Typophile because I thought of you the other day: At TypeCon I worked in the bookstore with you and I remember you remaking a sign because the kerning was off. The other day at work, I did the exact same thing. :)

-Scott

I, too, have always admired the work of Luis Gestalt!  
DB~
I'm a little anal, it is true. Ehehe. Welcome to the forums, Scott.
